adoptleanProvisioningAndRightsizing.title: Adoptlean Provisioning And Rightsizing
adoptleanProvisioningAndRightsizing.description: Reduce buffer size and release unused capacity

leverageAutoscaling.title: Leverage autoscaling
leverageAutoscaling.description: Automatically scale up/down workloads that have variable demand over time (eg, advanced analytics models)

leverageSavingsPlan.title: Leverage savings plan/reservations
leverageSavingsPlan.description: Cloud service providers would offer discounted rate in exchange for long-term commitment

utilizeSpotInstances.title: Utilize spot instances
utilizeSpotInstances.description: Switch portion of workloads to discounted spot instances (eg, low-priority or batch workloads)

scheduleInfrastructureAvailability.title: Schedule infrastructure availability
scheduleInfrastructureAvailability.description: Turn on/off for services/environments and workloads that do not need to run continuously

automateProvisioningWithGuardrails.title: Automate provisioning with guardrails
automateProvisioningWithGuardrails.description: Set up automated rules preventing certain types of inefficient provisioning activities
